reviewText: Fast shipping,and great show. My children love it,and want to watch it over,and over.
Grandsons love them,nana hears the songs in her sleep.oh well
Fast delivery my granddaughter loves it
My child loves Wonder pets sa e the reindeer and rhe other stories and wants to watch it almost everyday
Excellent deal for my little girls birthday. She loves Wonder Pets and Christmas so it was an easy choice. :)

My grandson loves wonder pets.  Much to the chagrin of his dad he sings songs from the dvd often.  I love it.  I have Wonder Pets saved on our DVR for his visits.  I believe they are great for young children.  Children seem to love the characters and the stories.
My daughter has loved wonder pets for easily 6 years and she can never get enough of them. Good for little ones. Entertaining and delightful.
